riddles:
What has holes and runnes down an alley?
A bowling ball.

A seven letter word containing thousands of letters?
Mailbox.

What is big and yellow and comes in the morning, to brighten mom's day?
School Bus.

You will always find me in the past. I can be created in the present, but the future can never taint me. What am I?
History.

What English word has three consecutive double letters?
Bookkeeper.

What belongs to you but others use it more than you do?
Your name.

You can see me in water, but I never get wet. What am I?
A reflection.

What is harder to catch the faster you run?
Your breath.

Feed me and I live, yet give me a drink and I die?
Fire

What has a Heart but no other organs?
A deck of cards

What travels alone but is never alone, has a nmae but doesn't exist?
A shadow.

I have billions of eyes, yet I live in darkness. I have millions of ears. yet only four lobes. I have no muscle, yet I rule two hemispheres. What am I?
The human brain.

What has neither nails or bones, but has four fingers and a thumb?
A glove.

What is the beginning of eternity, the end of time and space, the beginning of ever end and the end of every race?
The letter 'E'.

I am better than god, more evil than the devil. The poor have me, the rich want me, and if you eat me you'll die. What am I?
Nothing.

I travel all around the world but I never leave the corner. What am I?
A globe.
